name: Life on the Line
description:
Background of the game:

In an ancient kingdom, there is a young prince who is the future heir to the kingdom. However, his own brother, out of jealousy and malice, designs to murder him. The prince is framed and enters a dungeon full of dangerous traps and traps, which is full of traps and traps and very dangerous.

In Life on the Line, the player takes on the role of the prince and jumps and dodges all kinds of traps and obstacles, including jagged teeth, traps and monsters, to find the exit and escape from the dungeon full of dangerous traps.

Game Operation

The player can use the A,D keys to control the character's left and right movement, and space to jump.
